definition: stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol), someone who is intoxicated
details:
adjective
- stupefied or excited by a chemical substance (especially alcohol)
= synonyms: intoxicated
- as if under the influence of alcohol
= synonyms: intoxicated
noun
- someone who is intoxicated
- a chronic drinker
= synonyms: rummy, drunkard, sot, inebriate, wino
